main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    main.Game.java

    This class is used to build a game board with specified params and start or end a game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane mainLayout)
      This constructor gets a new main.Game, and sets it to the main layout, and creates a new tileBag.

      • Game

        public Game(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane mainLayout)
        This constructor gets a new main.Game, and sets it to the main layout, and creates a new tileBag.
        Parameters:
        mainLayout - The layout used within the game.

    • Method Detail

      • endGame

        public void endGame(Profile profile)
        This method ends the game, this happens when the user's player lands on the goal square. It adds to the wins and losses of the players. It also shows a notification on who won and allows the players to play again or exit.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile of the player who won.

        public void returnToMenu()
        This method allows the user to return to the main menu.

        This method gets the next player in the queue.
        Returns:

      • gameLoop

        public void gameLoop(Player player)
        This is a game loop which allows the game to save, and decrease any effect counters, this loop happens every turn.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose turn it is.
